name: Overgrown (5 Ever Games, sparkhur)
description:
Overgrown is an arena shooter where the hoards are hoards of trees!

Objective:
You lose if your forest becomes too overgrown! Keep that from happening as long as possible by shooting the trees

Controls:
- [WSAD] - Move
- [Mouse] - Aim and shoot
- [Right Click] - sprint

Made for Spring Jam 2021
- Programming and Design - 5evergames
 - Art, Music, SFX, and Design - sparkhur
